src.game
Class TheGame

java.lang.Object
  src.game.TheGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TheGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is a singleton class that actually runs the game. It implements Runnable.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07

setHasBeenCleared

public void setHasBeenCleared(boolean bool)
Sets whether or not the current map has been cleared. If the current city has not been cleared, it will check to see if it is clear every tick until it is clear.

Parameters:
bool - boolean : cleared
